|rad1chip2 = Intersil;ISL3685; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = MMCX |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The '''3Com '''logo, "P/N: 141000500000E", and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
There is a label with a MAC (00:90:D1:07:AE:54) on the wireless module. This MAC has a '''Eumitcom''' OUI, but '''Accton''' had acquired '''Eumitcom''' by this point.. so this is not terribly surprising. The default settings are from the FCC manual. :There are 23 entries in WiGLE (as of 11/25/2012) for '''101''' with a 00:90:D1 OUI. [[Category:English Documentation]]
